segments.text: Not yet . Do we need to take it with us ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . Otherwise I cannot go abroad .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is that hard to get a passport ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not at all . But we do need to keep it with us all the time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is hard to believe this little thing is so valuable to us .
segments.speaker: S2
